casebody.data:
James Talcott, Respondent, v. Herbert A. Lee et al., Appellants. Decided May 2, 1887. Appeal from judgment entered upon the report of a referee. Wayland E. Benjamin, for appellants. L. B. Bunnell, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and O’Gorman, JJ.

Opinion by Freedman, J. Judgment affirmed, with costs.
